Geography:
Domestic: Mount Lebanon, North,

Climate adaptation - skills and experien:
Policy and Governance: Contributing to adaptation strategies or policy development at any level.
Research and Analysis: Conducting studies, publications, or data collection related to adaptation.
Advocacy and Awareness: Leading campaigns or initiatives that influence adaptation decisions or public understanding.
Partnerships and Collaboration: Driving or participating in cross-sectoral adaptation efforts.
